Detailed Description

This is the base factory of all ParticleRenderer implementations.

virtual Ogre::String ParticleUniverse::ParticleRendererFactory::getRendererType ( void   )  const [pure virtual]

Returns the type of the factory, which identifies the particle Renderer type this factory creates.

Implemented in ParticleUniverse::BeamRendererFactory, ParticleUniverse::BillboardRendererFactory, ParticleUniverse::BoxRendererFactory, ParticleUniverse::EntityRendererFactory, ParticleUniverse::LightRendererFactory, ParticleUniverse::RibbonTrailRendererFactory, and ParticleUniverse::SphereRendererFactory.
